Name: Another Try
About the game: WARNING: ANOTHER TRY IS IN THE EARLY STAGES OF DEVELOPMENT. PERHAPS YOU SHOULD WAIT A WHILE BEFORE JOINING US. Explore the world alone or with friends. Go to abandoned cities to find weapons, food, and resources. Build houses and protect them from external threats. Create alliances with other players. All this will help you survive in a harsh post-Apocalypse world populated by the living dead.
